values: I'll be having a baby on January 26th. His name is going to be Anthony Dayton. Whee. Email me on hollow paradox.

Hey Sashes.

Shay, whur you at?

Anthony, you're a doll.  <3  Just wanted to say that.

Al, your journal entries amuse me.

Lissa, update! ( ignore the irony )

Nick, welcome.

Vaaaaaaaaaaaaaaalk.

Mars.  I love you in a completely platonic non lesbian way.

Everybody else, \m/  Keep rocking in the free world.

<center><font size=5>IT'S MY BIRTHDAY.</font></center>

Yay for me.  24 years of life, babbeh.

Him:  Speaking of tricks and all that, and because I'm such a dork, I thought of some excuse for this mark on my face.. I have no idea what it is or where it came from, but anyway .. People were asking and I was jus'like "I dunnooo" and then like.. 48 hours later I started thinking of what I shoulda said, cause I do that. And.. I thought of something.. like this:  I was rollin down Union when I saw one of my old girls playin tricks on the corner of 1st ave, so I went over and said 'Yo bitch, wha'choo think you're doin?' and she said some shit about makin bills for her new man, and I said, 'Wha's that? Is Daddy Rick gonna have to choke a bitch?' and her boy came up and POPPED me in the face, so I fed him some curb.

Me:  While we're on the subject of pimps and bitch smackin'. 
Could you imagine if there was a commerical market out there that sold consumer goods directed towards pimps?  Like...  ok, make believe commercial.

-- Two h0's standing on the street corner, a Cadillac pulls up, window rolls down, smoke billows out. --  "Yo, bitches, got muh money?"  h0's walk to the car, lean into the window.  "These mu'fu's ain't been actin' right tonight.  All we's got is a C-Note between us."  Pimp gets out of the car, pulls on a black glove.  "Bitch, you been actin' up?  You tryin' to steal my money?"  Slaps the hell out of her, with the gloved hand.  Close up on the glove, voice in the background.  "Pimp Gloves.  When your bitches don't act right, and you gotta smack the taste out of their mouth.  Comes in Junior Player, Li'l G, and Pimp Daddy Deluxe.  Sold at Target."

First, what genre of movie would this be?:Drama
What song would you use during the following scenes? (if applicable)
Opening Scene:My Beautiful by Lennon Murphy
A Confession:Criminal by Fiona Apple
Finding out a secret:People are Strange by The Doors
Giving Up:Asking You by Lennon Murphy
Left alone:All That She Wrote by Default
In Love:Case of You by Joni Mitchell
In a Rage:Awake by Godsmack
Jealousy:Just Like You by Three Days Grace
Sad Breakup:I'm Moving On by Rascal Flatts
Climax of Movie:Brake of Your Car by Lennon Murphy
Wasting Time:Wasted Time by The Eagles
Death:Angels by Sarah McLoughlin
Dance Club/Bar Scene:Darkside by Crazy Town
Nostalgia:Still by Brian McKnight
Cheating:I Wish It Would Rain by The Temptations
A Bad Day:Bad Day by Fuel
Fear:Time Is Running Out by Muse
Murder (or some other dramatic) Scene:I Fucking Hate You by Godsmack
Rainy Days:I'm Only Happy When It Rains by Garbage
Hopeful:Don't Speak by No Doubt
Finding the answers to your questions:Love Is the Drug by Roxy Music
Sex Scene:Lullaby by The Cure
At night:Wonderwall by Oasis
Closing scene:Schindlers List (violin) theme by John Williams
